name: Flaming Skeleton
languages: understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Heated Weapons
entries: When the skeleton hits with a metal melee weapon, the weapon deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage (included in the attack).

traits.name: Illumination
entries: The skeleton sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage and 3 (1d6 damage) fire damage.

actions.name: Ignite
entries: The skeleton flings itself at a Large or smaller creature within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1|saving throw} or be {@condition grappled} (escape DC 12). On a failed save, the target also takes 3 (1d6 damage) fire damage at the start of each of its turns, even after the {@action grapple} ends. If the target or a creature within 5 feet of it uses an action to put out the flames, or if some other effect douses the flames (such as the target being submerged in water), the effect ends.
